Job Description: This is an exercise in which two people will have a text  conversation about something
General Instruction: This is a text conversation in which you will be assinged a character with unqiue set of objectives that you should share with the other worker during the text conversation.  Each person is working together to answer a specific question

Job Description: The task exercise is a text conversation between two people in which one person helps solve a problem of the other person
General Instruction: During this exercise worker A will share an problem with worker B. Worker B will have to provide the defined solution to worker A's problem

Job Description: This exercise requires two workers to have a conversation using persona chracteristics
General Instruction: In this text conversation you will be given a set of attitudes and preferences that you should share with the other worker.
